title: Food
desc: Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.It is usually of plant or animal origin, and contains essential nutrients, such as carbohydrates, fats, proteins, vitamins, or minerals. The substance is ingested by an organism and assimilated by the organism 's cells to produce energy, maintain life, or  stimulate growth.

title: Corruption
desc: UITextView displays a region that can contain multiple lines of editable text. When a user taps a text view, a keyboard appears; when a user taps Return in the keyboard, the keyboard disappears and the text view can handle the input in an application-specific way. You can specify attributes, such as font, color, and alignment, that apply to all text in a text view.
